name: Puzzle 3D
description: This is a 3D puzzle game. The goal of the game is to put all the scattered cubes back in place to restore the original appearance of the 3D scene.
minimum_requirements: OS: Microsoft 64bit Windows 7 Processor: 64bit Intel compatible Dual Core CPU Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: DX11 compliant graphics card Storage: 350 MB available space Sound Card: DirectSound compatible
recommended_requirements: OS: Microsoft 64bit Windows 7 Processor: Intel Core i5, 3.2 GHz or faster Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce GTX 750 Ti or better DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 500 MB available space
